message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper is about speech recognition using an attention-based encoder-decoder network, which falls under natural language processing.
- cs.SD (Sound) is also a likely category as the paper deals with speech utterances and their recognition.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper proposes a technique to combine scores of external modules using shallow fusion.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is a possible category as the paper deals with a machine learning-based approach to speech recognition.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper proposes a technique to accelerate the beam search algorithm, which is a system-level optimization.
